verses.text_plain: And Miriam and Aaron spake against Moses because of the Ethiopian woman whom he had married: for he had married an Ethiopian woman.

1And Miriam and Aaron spake against Moses because of the Ethiopian woman whom he had married: for he had married an Ethiopian woman. ▼
▼ Ethiopian: or, Cushite
 , ▼
▼ married: Heb. taken
